RMCK01
Mario Kart Wii

License Unlock [_tZ]
045379CC 38600001 
045D94B8 60000000
045D9530 38000000
045D95A0 38000000
Instantly unlocks all created licenses giving you every track, character, and vehicle

TAS Code [Vega]
C21AAD18 0000000A
3D808033 618C6200
A18C0000 39600480
38800880 7D805838
7C005800 41820014
7D802038 7C002000
41820014 4800001C
3D808000 39600001
4800000C 3D808000
39600000 996C164E
7C0802A6 00000000
C250ED54 00000005
981E0014 3D808000
898C164E 2C0C0001
40A20014 7FCCF378
BB8C0004 BF8CFC9C
BF8CD81C 00000000
Copies the inputs of a ghost when activated, and stops when deactivated. Uses GCN Port 1 with X as the activator and Y as the deactivator. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=1036

Instant Finish [Computerbot2016]
045233A8 88030020
28336200 00000090
C25233A8 00000006
88030020 9421FF80
BC610008 38800002
38A00001 3D808052
618C2340 7D8803A6
4E800021 B8610008
38210080 00000000
E0000000 80008000
Instantly finishes the race when activated. Uses GCN Port 1 with Z as the activator. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=1435

Ghost Always Saves [Diamond, WhatIsLoaf]
0453720C 41820018
04844190 28000064
04845E5C 28000064
04844170 28000064
Makes it so that your ghost always saves (overwriting your previous best), removes the limit normally preventing ghosts over 6 minutes to save, allows ghosts with a time of 99:59.999 to save, and allows you to save the inputs from any ghost that goes over the input limit of the RKG file up to the point this limit is surpassed. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=952 & https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=1770 & https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=1909

Full Input Range (GCN) [stebler, _tZ]
061AE9D4 00000044
38600001 2C1F0000
40800008 3860FFFF
7C9F19D6 7C002000
40800008 7FE301D6
38600001 2C1E0000
40800008 3860FFFF
7C9E19D6 7C002000
40800008 7FC301D6
4800001C 00000000
0450A9E4 38600000
Allows you to use the full input range of the wii wheel on a gamecube controller as well as saving your ghost with the wii wheel icon. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=1719 & https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=1718

Same as full input range code for GCN but modifies the individual input ranges to make the gamecube control stick symmetrical. Source: https://discord.com/channels/657006723412000799/657109986228305940/1060405250151944272 & https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=1718

Advanced Live Replay [WhatisLoaf]
0451075C 60000000
04510760 60000000
C251CE4C 00000005
899E0B53 2C0C0002
40820018 A19E23DE
918400E4 818400DC
918400E0 38043E60
90040008 00000000
Allows you to live replay a ghost and compare against another ghost at the same time. View the replay of the ghost you want to live replay then race the ghost you want to compare against. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=1546

RFH Code (GCN) [Anarion]
C21AFF54 00000007
39C00200 7DCE0038
2C0E0200 40A2001C
8244FFF0 2C120001
40800010 3A520001
7C0E0050 48000008
3A400000 9244FFF0
B0040000 00000000
When the B button is held, you will instead press it on every other frame, resulting in rapid-fire/turbo inputs. Source: Unknown

RFH Code (Wiichuk) [Gaberboo]
C2734078 00000008
38C00400 706AXXXX
41820030 A13B0011
2C090000 40820020
60630400 907D0000
815D0004 614A0400
915D0004 39400001
48000008 39400000
995B0011 60000000
Need configuration. When the button activator is held, you will instead press B on every other frame, resulting in rapid-fire/turbo inputs. Source: https://discord.com/channels/214574342137315328/735589843513638940/1222041734851203164

Load Courses From NAND [_tZ]

9421FFA0 7C0802A6
90010064 BFA1004C
3961002C 7C6BE5AA

8016B420 52616365

2F830000 4FDEF042

38630004 38800001
819F0004 7D8903A6
4E800421 2C030000
4FC00382 419E0084
7C7E1B78 3BA1001F
57BD0034 7FC3F378
7FA4EB78 819F0008
7D8903A6 4E800421
83BD0000 80610044
2C030000 41820008
93A30000 7FA3EB78
38800020 80A10034
819F000C 7D8903A6
4E800421 7FA5EB78
7C7D1B78 7FC3F378
7FA4EB78 819F0010
7D8903A6 4E800421
7FC3F378 819F0014
7D8903A6 4E800421
4FDEF182 7FA3EB78
39610030 7C8BC4AA
BBA1004C 80010064
38210060 7C0803A6
419E0008 4E800020
806BFFFC 9421FF00
60000000 60000000
Used to play custom tracks on Dolphin without the use of 3rd-party tools. Create a folder called "Course" in the Wii NAND directory (Dolphin/User/Wii/Course or Dolphin Emulator/Wii/Course) and put the custom szs files in that folder with the corresponding file name you want to repalce. Source: Unknown

60000000 60000000
Same as previous code but for the whole filesystem. Instead create a folder called "RMCX01" in the Wii NAND directory and, using the folder structure of the DVD, place all your custom files you wish to replace there. Source: Unknown

Mirror Ghost Stick X [Gaberboo]
0650EEC0 0000000C
208300EF 50830636
BBA10014 00000000
Forces the ghost to mirror its X-axis joystick inputs. Source: https://discord.com/channels/214574342137315328/735589843513638940/1111060196098322442

Disable Data Save Reset [Vega]
04532980 7C601B78
Disables the forced data reset when using a different region's save file (rksys.dat). Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=1056

Auto Press A at Wii Remote Strap Screen [Elias_]
04007894 4E800020
Automatically presses A to skip the wrist strap screen (and the ESRB screen on NTSC-U). Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=1349

Faster Menu Navigation [east]
0437702C 00000000
04623A68 38000000
04885158 00000000
Disables the menu button transitions. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=389

No Music [CosmoCortney]
057FF4F1 6C6F6C00
Removes all in-game music but keeps sound effects and some menu music. Source: https://discord.com/channels/214574342137315328/356185849337085953/503615153024270338

No Background Music [davidevgen]
048901A8 30000000
Removes all background music, which includes; track music, menu music, and WFC music. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=45

No Background Blur [davidevgen]
04257F44 30000000
Removes the blur given to the track model at large distances. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=485

No Timer Flash [_tZ]
047E6348 60000000
Removes the timer flashing animation when finishing a lap. Source: Unknown

No Lap Count [davidevgen]
0452308C 2C000001
Prevents laps from counting. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=193

No Voice Sounds [davidevgen]
048901C8 30000000
Disables all character sound effects in-game and in menus. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=482

Remove Mii Tag [DarkFlare]
0489819C 2EDBE6FF
Removes the Mii tag when racing in Time Trials. Source: Unknown

Remove Minimap [Shori] 
04895BC4 00000000
04895BC8 00000000
Removes the minimap. Source: Unknown

Remove HUD [Bully]
047DAA4C 60000000
Moves the HUD to the background, essentially removing it. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=60

Region Changer [Anarion, Atlas]
02418BF8 0000XXYY
00418B87 0000000R
04418BFC ZZZZzzzz
Need configuration. Changes the flag displayed on ghosts, the region ID (the colour of the line displayed in online races), and the globe position when on the globe screen. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=94 & https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=93 & https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=95

DE000000 90509150
58010000 00000054
DE000000 90509150
82200005 8000152C
9A00345F 00000014
E0000000 80008000
Allows you to clone the mii of a ghost and use that mii. Go to a ghost with the mii you want tocopy in the ghost select screen then press the Z button; it will then temporarily replace the first mii in your mii list. Source: https://mariokartwii.com/showthread.php?tid=274

C27DD258 00000003
39800003 91840090
39800005 9184008C

Need configuration. Allows you to fly in any direction. Use the C-stick to levitate in each direction, the analog stick to turn in each direction, and the A and B buttons to fly forwards or backwards. Deactivates when the configured button is pressed.
